file_content.text: Gormak weapons are in our labs. The mighty Graata thanks you.
Treemo. The Gormak are dead. I have your weapons.
These were Czerka models? Gormak are savage, but good workers. These go straight to labs.
You bring great riches to Graata the Hutt. He looks forward to new business with the Empire.
The generous Graata wonders when his weapons will be returned.
Wait, please. Many warriors can face many Gormak. I can pay for your strength.
My lord. You come to Voss for alliance, yes? Maybe Empire can win without it.
Must be hard on Voss, hunter. No fighting, no targets. What if I had legal target?
You deal with Voss. Lots of credits on Voss. But Voss can't help you make them.
I am Treemo. I speak for mighty Graata the Hutt. Cunning Graata has found way to manufacture his own Gormak weapons.
You hear of Gormak skill making weapons, yes? Advanced mods. Turn old into new. Better than even black market.
The Gormak won't trade weapons with us.
And just as rare.
Graata knows this. Sent agent to talk with Gormak. Gormak sent head back.
How so?
What Gormak salvage, they make new. Advanced designs, better firepower.
I don't need them.
But Empire might want weapons, yes? Graata can make Gormak work for you.
Gormak too savage for deals, need tricks. Leave best Czerka models unguarded. Gormak take bait, modify weapons. Then we take back.
But Gormak make weapons too good. Use them against Graata thugs who go to recover. All dead. Need warriors to retrieve weapons.
I could kill you and keep everything myself.
Maybe I want the weapons.
Can't. Weapons advanced, but unstable. Graata will make them safe, reliable.
Eventually, the Gormak will catch on.
You need more than one batch.
Graata engineers will study weapons and copy. No need for Gormak after that.
Depends on the terms.
In exchange for assistance, Graata will sell completed weapons to Empire only. Wholesale, at discount!
Use against Republic. Or offer to Voss. You get weapons back, both our masters profit. Good deal?
Excellent deal.
I want more.
Graata the Hutt has set bounty on weapons. Standard rate, but very good.
Gormak deactivated tracking devices, but these coordinates of original drop point.
Find Gormak. Don't die. Bring weapons to me. You will have mighty Graata's thanks.
No thanks. [Refuse quest]
Empire's loss. Maybe Republic's gain? Graata the Hutt will see.
Can't talk now. Here on important business for the mighty Graata.
